 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָמַד‎</span>] **verb** ==bind, join== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind, wind***, specifically of girl with two lovers [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>GGN 1893, 470</sup>; ***fasten*** (cattle) to yoke [[BDB#Dozy|Dozy]], <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***yoke***, ***Id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒmâdu***</u></abbr>, ***bind***, ***harness***, so Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and III. ***be attached, attach oneself***, specifically ***be*** (religiously) ***devoted***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צְמַד‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***bind***); — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצָּ֫מֶד‎</span> [[Num.25.3|Num 25:3]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצָּֽדְֶוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.28|Ps 106:28]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִעצמָדִים‎</span> [[Num.25.5|Num 25:5]] ***join, attach, oneself*** to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) Baal Peor, i.e. adopt his worship [[Num.25.3|Num 25:3]]; [[Num.25.5|Num 25:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), whence [[Ps.106.28|Ps 106:28]]. **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְצֻמֶּ֫דֶת‎</span> [[2Sam.20.8|2Sam 20:8]] a sword ***bound*** upon (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span>) his loins. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּצְמִיד מִרְמָה‎</span> [[Ps.50.19|Ps 50:19]] ***thy tongue combineth*** (fitteth together, frameth) ***deceit*** (&gt; denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶמֶד‎</span> [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup> 170</sup>).
